Pure, raw, unprocessed honey is a healthier sweetener than table sugar and high fructose corn syrup. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s chock-full of antioxidants, minerals, and vitamins--and only has 21 calories per teaspoon.

Super Ã¢â‚¬Å“bee foodsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (including nutrient-rich bee pollen, propolis, and royal jelly) are used and touted for their healing powers by beekeepers and medical experts in the present-day.
